indications: Difficulty in urination and defecation, constipation

action.primary: Breaks up Blood Stasis and eliminates masses

indications: Topically for snake bites, scabies, fungal infections, warts and melanoma

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with loose stools.
Contraindicated for those with constitutional weakness.

notes: Appropriate quantity is pounded into a paste and applied topically.
It was reported that the seeds of Euphorbia had a significant effect on leukemia, esophageal carcinoma and skin cancer.
For ringworm, it is applied externally.
